0DH.F.summary: PT Darma Henwa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides mining contracting, general mining, and equipment maintenance services in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Mining Contractor and Other Services. The company is involved in various mining activities, including land clearing, top soiling, drilling, blasting, overburden removal and dumping, coal getting, coal rom, coal hauling, coal barging, vegetation, and rehabilitation activities, as well as engages in equipment rental and port service businesses. The company was formerly known as PT HWE Indonesia and changed its name to PT Darma Henwa Tbk in September 2005. PT Darma Henwa Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

3IB.F.summary: PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining activities. The company operates seven mining concessions in the island of Kalimantan covering East, Central, and South Kalimantan. It also owns and operates the Bontang Coal Terminal/BoCT, three loading ports, and Bontang power plant. In addition, the company provides mining support, coal and fuel trading, coal transportation, and alternative energy marketing and support services, as well as engages in electricity generation activity. It primarily sells its coal in Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, Europe, Australia, and other parts of Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk is a subsidiary of Banpu Minerals (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.

44H.F.summary: PT Harum Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining and logistics activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining Sectors, Shipping Services, and Others Sectors divisions. The Coal Mining Sectors division is involved in the general survey, exploration, exploitation, transportation, processing, and sale of coal. The Shipping Services division engages in the transportation and rental of tugboats and barges. The Others Sectors division invests in coal mining, trading, and services businesses. The company also exports its products to China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, India, Bangladesh, Thailand, the Philippines, Singapore, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Asia Antrasit and changed its name to PT Harum Energy Tbk in November 2007. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Harum Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Karunia Bara Perkasa.

A64.F.summary: PT Adaro Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated coal mining and energy company in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining and Trading; Mining Services; Logistics; and Others segments. The company provides coal mining and trading, mining contracting, quarrying, mining support services, warehousing, coal barging and ship loading, channel dredging and maintenance, stevedoring, port services, forestry, power generation, and water and mud treatment services; and coal handling and barging, terminal handling, farming, trading, power plant, and construction services, as well as repair and installation of machines; manufactures, repairs, and maintains sea transportation; and treats mine water into potable water. It also exports its products to China, Malaysia, Japan, India, South Korea, and internationally. The company was formerly known as PT Padang Karunia and changed its name to PT Adaro Energy Tbk in April 2008. PT Adaro Energy Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ABMM.JK.summary: PT ABM Investama Tbk operates in the energy resources, energy services, and energy infrastructure sectors in Indonesia. It operates in three segments: Mining Contractors and Coal Mining, Services, and Fabrication. The company owns coal mining concessions; supplies fuel for mining process; and supports engineered product and manufacturing services for mining activities. It offers port management services, which include technical and operational management services for handling, storing, loading and unloading operations; stevedoring and seaport services; floating crane, harbor tug, tug boat, and transshipment logistics services; warehousing management solutions for storage, inventory management, and distribution; freight management services; transportation management services for overweight and oversized items, such as transportation of heavy equipment, machinery, factory equipment, and power plants; integrated logistics and material management services for resource and energy industry, including drilling, exploration, and production activities. It also provides business management consulting services, including planning and designing the framework of developing business management in mining, energy, engineering, industry, oil, gas and geothermal energy, energy resources, and other consulting services; and rents offices and residential areas, as well as heavy equipment in mining and other industries. In addition, the company engages in the trade of petroleum; provides electricity solutions; manufactures equipment for heavy equipment and material transportation; and produces low calorific thermal coal. The company was formerly known as PT Adiratna Bani Makmur and changed its name to PT ABM Investama Tbk in August 2009. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT ABM Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of Valle Verde Pte. Ltd.

ADOOY.summary: PT Adaro Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated coal mining and energy company in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining and Trading; Mining Services; Logistics; and Others segments. The company provides coal mining and trading, mining contracting, quarrying, mining support services, warehousing, coal barging and ship loading, channel dredging and maintenance, stevedoring, port services, forestry, power generation, and water and mud treatment services; and coal handling and barging, terminal handling, farming, trading, power plant, and construction services, as well as repair and installation of machines; manufactures, repairs, and maintains sea transportation; and treats mine water into potable water. It also exports its products to China, Malaysia, Japan, India, South Korea, and internationally. The company was formerly known as PT Padang Karunia and changed its name to PT Adaro Energy Tbk in April 2008. PT Adaro Energy Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ADRO.JK.summary: PT Adaro Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated coal mining and energy company in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining and Trading; Mining Services; Logistics; and Others segments. The company provides coal mining and trading, mining contracting, quarrying, mining support services, warehousing, coal barging and ship loading, channel dredging and maintenance, stevedoring, port services, forestry, power generation, and water and mud treatment services; and coal handling and barging, terminal handling, farming, trading, power plant, and construction services, as well as repair and installation of machines; manufactures, repairs, and maintains sea transportation; and treats mine water into potable water. It also exports its products to China, Malaysia, Japan, India, South Korea, and internationally. The company was formerly known as PT Padang Karunia and changed its name to PT Adaro Energy Tbk in April 2008. PT Adaro Energy Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

AIMS.JK.long_name: PT Akbar Indo Makmur Stimec Tbk
AIMS.JK.summary: PT Akbar Indo Makmur Stimec Tbk engages in the coal mining and trading business in Indonesia. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Akbar Indo Makmur Stimec Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Aims Indo Investama.

ARII.JK.summary: PT Atlas Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mining, exploration, development, production, and sale of coal primarily in Indonesia and internationally. It produces a range of low to high calorific value thermal coal, as well as metallurgical coal for use in steel production, power generation, cement, and general manufacturing. The company holds various mining concessions covering a total area of approximately 200,000 hectares in Indonesia. In addition, it is involved in trading, services, construction, transportation, printing, industrial, logistics, investment, and agricultural activities. Further, the company operates workshops. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BNB.F.summary: PT Bayan Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the open cut mining and sale of coal in Kalimantan. It operates through Coal and Non-Coal segments. The company produces semi-soft coking, bituminous, sub-bituminous low-sulphur, and low-ash coal. It has rights to mine 5 coal contracts of works and 16 mining business permits with a concession area of 126,293 hectares. The company also owns and operates a Balikpapan coal terminal located in Balikpapan, East Kalimantan, as well as owns and manages two Kalimantan floating transfer barges located in East Kalimantan. In addition, it is involved in the provision of mining contractor, port management, shipping, construction, transportation, and trading services. PT Bayan Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BOSS.JK.long_name: PT. Borneo Olah Sarana Sukses Tbk
BOSS.JK.summary: PT. Borneo Olah Sarana Sukses Tbk operates as a coal exploration and production company in Indonesia. The company's mining assets are located in Muara Pahu, Kutai Barat, and East Kalimantan regions. It exports its products to Japan, South Korea, the United States, the Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, India, and Bangladesh. PT. Borneo Olah Sarana Sukses Tbk is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

BSSR.JK.summary: PT Baramulti Suksessarana Tbk mines and trades in transports coal. The company holds interests in the PT Antang Gunung Meratus coal concession covering an area of approximately 22,433 hectares located in South Kalimantan; and the PT Baramulti Suksessarana coal concession totaling an area of approximately 2,459.8 hectares located in East Kalimantan. It exports coal to Indonesia, China, India, the Philippines, South Korea, Vietnam, Thailand, Taiwan, and Japan. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Baramulti Suksessarana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wahana Sentosa Cemerlang.

BUMI.JK.summary: PT Bumi Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the mining activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal, Services, Oil and Gas, and Gold segments. The Coal segment engages in the exploration, exploitation, and sale of coal deposits. The Services segment offers marketing and management services. The Oil and Gas segment explores for oil and gas properties. The Gold segment explores for gold properties. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Bumi Modern Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bumi Resources Tbk in September 2000. PT Bumi Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bumi Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of Long Haul Holdings Ltd.

BYAN.JK.summary: PT Bayan Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the open cut mining and sale of coal in Kalimantan. It operates through Coal and Non-Coal segments. The company produces semi-soft coking, bituminous, sub-bituminous low-sulphur, and low-ash coal. It has rights to mine 5 coal contracts of works and 16 mining business permits with a concession area of 126,293 hectares. The company also owns and operates a Balikpapan coal terminal located in Balikpapan, East Kalimantan, as well as owns and manages two Kalimantan floating transfer barges located in East Kalimantan. In addition, it is involved in the provision of mining contractor, port management, shipping, construction, transportation, and trading services. PT Bayan Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DEWA.JK.summary: PT Darma Henwa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides mining contracting, general mining, and equipment maintenance services in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Mining Contractor and Other Services. The company is involved in various mining activities, including land clearing, top soiling, drilling, blasting, overburden removal and dumping, coal getting, coal rom, coal hauling, coal barging, vegetation, and rehabilitation activities, as well as engages in equipment rental and port service businesses. The company was formerly known as PT HWE Indonesia and changed its name to PT Darma Henwa Tbk in September 2005. PT Darma Henwa Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DOID.JK.summary: PT Delta Dunia Makmur Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates as a mining contractor in Indonesia. The company provides coal mining, overburden removal, coal hauling, waste removal, reclamation, and land rehabilitation services, as well as coal transportation and road maintenance services. It also engages in the rental of heavy equipment. PT Delta Dunia Makmur Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DSSA.JK.summary: PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the power generation, trading, coal mining and trading, multimedia, forestry, and infrastructure businesses. It operates through Supply of Steam and Electricity, Fertilizer and Chemicals Trading, Rent, and Coal Mining and Trading segments. The company operates 4 units of captive power plants located in Tangerang, Serang, Karawang-1, and Karawang-2 with a total capacity of 600 megawatts. It also offers research and development, and management consulting services; trades in chemicals, pesticides, and fertilizers; and engages in the pulp and wood chip mill activities. In addition, the company provides pay TV and Internet service provider services; and venture capital and management services. It also operates in Indonesia, China, India, Korea, Spain, Thailand, Cambodia, and Dubai. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Tunggal.

DSX.SG.summary: PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the power generation, trading, coal mining and trading, multimedia, forestry, and infrastructure businesses. It operates through Supply of Steam and Electricity, Fertilizer and Chemicals Trading, Rent, and Coal Mining and Trading segments. The company operates 4 units of captive power plants located in Tangerang, Serang, Karawang-1, and Karawang-2 with a total capacity of 600 megawatts. It also offers research and development, and management consulting services; trades in chemicals, pesticides, and fertilizers; and engages in the pulp and wood chip mill activities. In addition, the company provides pay TV and Internet service provider services; and venture capital and management services. It also operates in Indonesia, China, India, Korea, Spain, Thailand, Cambodia, and Dubai. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Tunggal.

DWGL.JK.summary: PT Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading activities in Indonesia. It also offers port, crushing, loading, and barging services. The company has a concession area of 412.8 hectares located in the Jilatan Village, district of Batu Ampar, Regency of Tanah Laut, South Kalimantan. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Banjarmasin, Indonesia. PT Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk is a subsidiary of Hawthorn-Capital Investment Pte. Ltd.

FIRE.JK.summary: PT Alfa Energi Investama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading business in Indonesia. The company holds interests in a concession with approximately 2,089 hectares located in Kutai Kartanegara, East Kalimantan; and a concession with approximately 6,000 hectares located in West Kutai, East Kalimantan. It also provides coal mining management services. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

HRUM.JK.summary: PT Harum Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining and logistics activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining Sectors, Shipping Services, and Others Sectors divisions. The Coal Mining Sectors division is involved in the general survey, exploration, exploitation, transportation, processing, and sale of coal. The Shipping Services division engages in the transportation and rental of tugboats and barges. The Others Sectors division invests in coal mining, trading, and services businesses. The company also exports its products to China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, India, Bangladesh, Thailand, the Philippines, Singapore, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Asia Antrasit and changed its name to PT Harum Energy Tbk in November 2007. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Harum Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Karunia Bara Perkasa.

INDY.JK.summary: PT. Indika Energy Tbk operates as an integrated energy company in Indonesia. The company operates through Energy Resources, Energy Services, Energy Infrastructure, and Other Portfolio Holdings segments. The Energy Resources segment produces coal. This segment undertakes surface coal mining at a 50,921 hectares concession in Paser Regency, East Kalimantan, Indonesia. The Energy Services segment provides mining, engineering, procurement, construction, and offshore supply base services in the coal, and oil and gas sectors; and operation, maintenance, and logistics services. The Energy Infrastructure segment operates 660 megawatt coal-fired power plant in Cirebon, West Java. It also provides sea logistics and transportation solutions for bulk materials and natural resources; and offshore supply logistics services for oil and gas companies. In addition, this segment engages in the port operations; and provision of logistics, integrated operation, management, and maintenance services. The company is also involved in the investment, general trading, marketing, financing, coal and mineral trading, contracting, development, construction, industrial, agriculture, printing, workshop, and transportation activities; and provision of consultancy services for construction, industry, and infrastructure, as well as waste management services. In addition, the company provides transportation management, business and management consultancy, gold mining, real estate and trading, shipping, warehousing, and other services. Further, it offers information and communication, professional, scientific and technical manpower, travelling agent, insurance, vehicle repair maintenance, and retail and rental and lease services, as well as digital technology services. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ITMG.JK.summary: PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining activities. The company operates seven mining concessions in the island of Kalimantan covering East, Central, and South Kalimantan. It also owns and operates the Bontang Coal Terminal/BoCT, three loading ports, and Bontang power plant. In addition, the company provides mining support, coal and fuel trading, coal transportation, and alternative energy marketing and support services, as well as engages in electricity generation activity. It primarily sells its coal in Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, Europe, Australia, and other parts of Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk is a subsidiary of Banpu Minerals (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.

KALG.summary: KAL Energy, Inc. engages in the exploration, extraction, and distribution of coal. It holds interests in two coal concessions situated near the Mahakam River in north eastern Kalimantan, Indonesia. The company was formerly known as Patriarch, Inc. and changed its name to KAL Energy, Inc. in November 2006. KAL Energy, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KKGI.JK.summary: PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk engages in coal and methane mining in Indonesia. It also manufactures and sells high pressure laminate and melamine laminated particle boards; and provides harbor management and electricity supply services. In addition, the company engages in hydropower plant industry, real estate, and trading activities. The company was formerly known as PT Kurnia Kapuas Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk in November 2003. PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

MBAP.JK.summary: PT Mitrabara Adiperdana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining, trading, and industrial businesses. It holds interests in coal mines, which cover a total area of 2,960 hectares located in Malinau Regency, North Kalimantan. The company also operates biomass power plants; and provides plantation and forestry services. It sells its products in South Korea, China, the Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, New Zealand, Vietnam, Hongkong, Japan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Mitrabara Adiperdana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wahana Sentosa Cemerlang.

MYOH.JK.summary: PT Samindo Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides coal and other mining services primarily in Indonesia. Its activities include overburden removal, coal getting, coal hauling, and geological mapping and drilling. The company was formerly known as PT Myoh Technology, Tbk and changed its name to PT Samindo Resources Tbk in February 2012. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. Samindo Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of ST International Corporation.

PBMRF.summary: PT Bumi Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the mining activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal, Services, Oil and Gas, and Gold segments. The Coal segment engages in the exploration, exploitation, and sale of coal deposits. The Services segment offers marketing and management services. The Oil and Gas segment explores for oil and gas properties. The Gold segment explores for gold properties. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Bumi Modern Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bumi Resources Tbk in September 2000. PT Bumi Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bumi Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of Long Haul Holdings Ltd.

PBMRY.summary: PT Bumi Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the mining activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal, Services, Oil and Gas, and Gold segments. The Coal segment engages in the exploration, exploitation, and sale of coal deposits. The Services segment offers marketing and management services. The Oil and Gas segment explores for oil and gas properties. The Gold segment explores for gold properties. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Bumi Modern Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bumi Resources Tbk in September 2000. PT Bumi Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bumi Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of Long Haul Holdings Ltd.

PJM.F.summary: PT Bumi Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the mining activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal, Services, Oil and Gas, and Gold segments. The Coal segment engages in the exploration, exploitation, and sale of coal deposits. The Services segment offers marketing and management services. The Oil and Gas segment explores for oil and gas properties. The Gold segment explores for gold properties. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Bumi Modern Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bumi Resources Tbk in September 2000. PT Bumi Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bumi Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of Long Haul Holdings Ltd.

PTBA.JK.summary: PT Bukit Asam Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining activities in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Coal Mining and Other. Its coal mining activities include general surveying, exploration, exploitation, processing, refining, transportation, and trading. It manages special coal port facilities; operates steam power plants; and provides consulting services related to the coal mining industry and production. The company also offers briquette processing, mining services, oil palm plantation and processing, and health services. It also operates in India, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Asam Persero Tbk and changed its name to PT Bukit Asam Tbk in November 2017. PT Bukit Asam Tbk was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tanjung Enim Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bukit Asam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium.

PTIZF.summary: PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining activities. The company operates seven mining concessions in the island of Kalimantan covering East, Central, and South Kalimantan. It also owns and operates the Bontang Coal Terminal/BoCT, three loading ports, and Bontang power plant. In addition, the company provides mining support, coal and fuel trading, coal transportation, and alternative energy marketing and support services, as well as engages in electricity generation activity. It primarily sells its coal in Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, Europe, Australia, and other parts of Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk is a subsidiary of Banpu Minerals (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.

SGER.JK.summary: PT Sumber Global Energy offers coal trading services. The company is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SMMT.JK.summary: PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining business in Indonesia. The company owns interests in a coal concession that covers an area of 3,238 hectares located in Samarinda, East Kalimantan; and three coal concessions covering 2.143 hectares located in Musi Rawas Regency, South Sumatera province. It also offers mining support and coal transportation services. In addition, the company exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Eatertainment International Tbk and changed its name to PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk in August 2012. PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk was founded in 1980 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TBA.F.summary: PT Bukit Asam Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining activities in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Coal Mining and Other. Its coal mining activities include general surveying, exploration, exploitation, processing, refining, transportation, and trading. It manages special coal port facilities; operates steam power plants; and provides consulting services related to the coal mining industry and production. The company also offers briquette processing, mining services, oil palm plantation and processing, and health services. It also operates in India, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Asam Persero Tbk and changed its name to PT Bukit Asam Tbk in November 2017. PT Bukit Asam Tbk was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tanjung Enim Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bukit Asam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium.

TBNGY.summary: PT Bukit Asam Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining activities in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Coal Mining and Other. Its coal mining activities include general surveying, exploration, exploitation, processing, refining, transportation, and trading. It manages special coal port facilities; operates steam power plants; and provides consulting services related to the coal mining industry and production. The company also offers briquette processing, mining services, oil palm plantation and processing, and health services. It also operates in India, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Asam Persero Tbk and changed its name to PT Bukit Asam Tbk in November 2017. PT Bukit Asam Tbk was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tanjung Enim Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bukit Asam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium.

TOBA.JK.summary: PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining, palm oil plantation, and power generation businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It owns interests in the Adimitra Baratama Nusantara mine covering an area of 2,990 hectares; the Trisensa Mineral Utama that covers an area of 3,414 hectares; and the Indomining mine covering an area of 683 hectares situated in Sangasanga, Kutai Kartanegara, East Kalimantan. The company also trades in coal. In addition, it has palm oil cultivation area totaling 8,633 hectares in Muara Jawa, Sangasanga, and Loa Janan District, Kutai Kartanegara Regency, East Kalimantan; and operates as an independent power producer. The company was formerly known as PT Toba Bara Sejahtra Tbk. PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of Highland Strategic Holdings Pte. Ltd.

UNIQ.JK.summary: PT Ulima Nitra Tbk offers mining services, truck and heavy equipment rental, construction services, and others. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Palembang, Indonesia.
